import React from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addProduct } from "../redux/userCart"; const Container = styled.div`` const Wrapper = styled.div`` const Div = styled.div`` const Img = styled.img`` const Button = styled.button`` const H2 = styled.h2`` const P = styled.p`` const H3 = styled.h3`` const singleProduct = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleClick=()=>{ dispatch(addProduct({props,quantity})) } return (

{props.name}

{props.discription}

{props.email}
); } export default singleProduct;
